thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 89 of 3150
thread.title: Tim Moore

author: Tim Moore
title: Tim Moore
text: I booked a rental car with ace through rental cars .com because they promised the car would be ready at the airport. Instead, the car is on an off site lot. To find it, I've now incurred $20 in long distance fees and have to wait for 45 minutes for some guy to come pick me up and take me to this unknown location. I PAID MORE BECAUSE RENTALCARS .com said the car is AT THE AIRPORT. I did so because I have a very tight schedule. I will be persueing reimbursement.
